messages.subject: 'Balance
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/12/02 12:08:58 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/12/02 12:08:58 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< You are now implying that the rights and
freedoms my children have are not real. What gives you basis to make that
judgement? Because they have to ration thier time on the PC? Or finish
thier
chores before they watch TV? >>

Because you put the terms rights and freedoms in quotes, which indicates the
way you felt about it, not someone else.
And it's not really freedom to be made to do something before you watch tv.
It's ok if that's what you choose to do, but just don't call it freedom.

Ren
"Knowledge will not always take the place of simple observation."
~Arnold Lobel
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
